enchantment.mcdw.accelerate.desc: Increases attack speed for each consecutive shot. Resets three seconds after the attack.
enchantment.mcdw.ambush.desc: Deal extra damage whilst sneaking and invisible.
enchantment.mcdw.anima_conduit.desc: Each XP orb grants a small amount of health.
enchantment.mcdw.bonus_shot.desc: Fires an extra projectile towards a secondary target.
enchantment.mcdw.burst_bowstring.desc: Shoots nearby mobs when you jump, costing one arrow per jump per level. Projectiles deal 40% of an arrow's damage.
enchantment.mcdw.chain_reaction.desc: A chance to fire extra projectiles from target hit with an arrow.
enchantment.mcdw.chains.desc: A chance to pull mobs together and slow them down.
enchantment.mcdw.charge.desc: Chance to receive the speed effect whilst attacking an enemy.
enchantment.mcdw.cobweb_shot.desc: Cover an enemy or block in cobweb when your arrow hits its target.
enchantment.mcdw.committed.desc: A chance to deal damage relative to target's health.
enchantment.mcdw.critical_hit.desc: A chance to deal critical hit without jumping.
enchantment.mcdw.dipping_poison.desc: Gives 8 poisoned arrows upon drinking a health potion.
enchantment.mcdw.dynamo.desc: Increases the damage of your next attack after jumping. This effect can stack up to 20 times.
enchantment.mcdw.echo.desc: A chance to deal AoE sound damage in an area of 3 blocks.
enchantment.mcdw.enigma_resonator.desc: A chance to deal damage relative to the amount of XP the user has.
enchantment.mcdw.exploding.desc: A chance that target explodes upon death causing damage to surrounding enemies.
enchantment.mcdw.freezing.desc: A chance to slow target and gives them mining fatigue.
enchantment.mcdw.fuse_shot.desc: A chance that arrow explodes on impact.
enchantment.mcdw.gravity.desc: A chance to pull in and toss targets. Distance thrown is relative to level.
enchantment.mcdw.growing.desc: Deal extra damage the farther you are from the target.
enchantment.mcdw.guarding_strike.desc: Gain resistance status effect for killing mobs.
enchantment.mcdw.jungle_poison.desc: A chance to apply poison to target.
enchantment.mcdw.leeching.desc: Heal relative to the max health of the target upon its death.
enchantment.mcdw.levitation_shot.desc: Fire a shot that gives the levitation status effect much like a shulker bullet.
enchantment.mcdw.overcharge.desc: Continue to hold the ranged attack button to double, triple, or quadruple charge a bow, increasing its damage each time.
enchantment.mcdw.pain_cycle.desc: Attacking drains your life to grant one stack of Pain Cycle. At 5 stacks, your pain is channeled into your next attack.
enchantment.mcdw.phantoms_mark.desc: Sets glowing on the target relative to the level of the enchantment.
enchantment.mcdw.poison_cloud.desc: A chance to spawn a poison cloud around a target.
enchantment.mcdw.prospector.desc: A chance to find an emerald upon killing a target.
enchantment.mcdw.radiance.desc: A chance to spawn a healing cloud around a target.
enchantment.mcdw.radiance_shot.desc: A chance to spawn a healing cloud around target hit by an arrow.
enchantment.mcdw.rampaging.desc: A chance to gain stacking haste on a kill.
enchantment.mcdw.refreshment.desc: Refills empty bottles as health potions upon kill with melee weapon.
enchantment.mcdw.refreshment_shot.desc: Refills empty bottles as health potions upon kill with ranged weapon.
enchantment.mcdw.replenish.desc: A chance to recover an arrow upon firing.
enchantment.mcdw.ricochet.desc: The arrow bounces from target to target.
enchantment.mcdw.rushdown.desc: A chance to gain stacking speed on a kill.
enchantment.mcdw.shadow_barb.desc: Firing from a crossbow will not break Shadow Form.
enchantment.mcdw.shadow_shot.desc: A chance to grant player Shadow Form on a kill.
enchantment.mcdw.shockwave.desc: A chance to deal explosive damage in an area of 3 blocks.
enchantment.mcdw.smiting.desc: Deals AoE damage to Undead in an area of 3 blocks.
enchantment.mcdw.soul_devourer.desc: Multiplies XP gained from a kill.
enchantment.mcdw.soul_siphon.desc: A chance to gain extra XP from a kill.
enchantment.mcdw.stunning.desc: Chance to nearly stop a target and cause nausea.
enchantment.mcdw.swirling.desc: Chance to hit all entities in a 1.5 block radius around the user.
enchantment.mcdw.tempo_theft.desc: Steal speed from your target, slowing them and speeding yourself up.
enchantment.mcdw.thundering.desc: Chance to summon a lightning bolt and damage entities in a range relative to the level.
enchantment.mcdw.void_strike.desc: Deal multiplicative damage based on level of enchantment.
enchantment.mcdw.void_shot.desc: Deal multiplicative damage based on level of enchantment.
enchantment.mcdw.weakening.desc: Chance to spawn a weakness cloud around the target.
enchantment.mcdw.wild_rage.desc: Hitting an enemy has a chance to send it into a rage, making it hostile towards everyone.
